title: Update on the upcoming meeting of the British Society for the Turin Shroud
post: No need for games. The meeting is at St Michael’s Resource Centre, Grenfell Road, Beaconsfield HP9 2BP, about halfway between Oxford and London.
author: Paulette

title: Update on the upcoming meeting of the British Society for the Turin Shroud
post: The venue is  just two minutes walk from Beaconsfield Station on the Chiltern Line.  By road, just follow the signs on the M40 to the Model Village which is in the same road. Please let me know if you are attending to ensure adequate refreshments etc.
author: shroudenigma
